name: Tic-Tac-Toe Arena
description:
Hey!

"Tic-Tac-Toe Arena" is a classic Tic-Tac-Toe / XO's / Noughts and Crosses game in full 3D! It's well-known game in a new format with nice graphics and dynamic soundtrack. It's tailored to deliver fun experience every time you have got a minute to jump into the battle. It's free.

Rules are simple.
Arena has 5 rounds to be played and each round starts from tossing a coin.
"X" and "O" tossing outcomes are representing the player who's symbol goes first. The player who succeeds in placing required amount of symbols in horizontal, vertical or diagonal row is the winner of the round. Arena winner is decided by the total number of succeeded rounds.

Features of the game allow you choose between:
- 3 Arenas with different themes, VFX and dedicated dynamic soundtracks
- 3 Game Grids - 3x3 with 3 winning symbols / 5x5 with 4 winning symbols and 7x7 with 5 winning symbols.
- 2 Game modes to try your skill with AI or challenge your Friend
- First turn symbol is not the rule anymore! - choose your lucky one!

We appreciate any feedback, don't hesitate to leave one here or on the market.

Have a nice play!
